last_episode_to_air.name: Part 2
last_episode_to_air.overview: While the success of Crocodile Dundee catapults Hoges onto the world stage, things aren't so easy at home. After 30 years of marriage to his first love, he is falling for his co-star, Linda Kozlowski.

name: Hoges: The Paul Hogan Story
overview: The story of Paul Hogan is that of almost accidental supernova of raw comedic talent exploding onto the entertainment scene of first Australia and then the world. How a married-at-eighteen blue-collar worker with five kids (and on to his fortieth job) went on talent contest New Faces as a dare from his work-mates and ended up completely wowing the audience and opening the door to completely unanticipated new life.
